pages.text: $(l:crafting/runic_shears)Runic shears$() in a dispenser can be used to automatically harvest $(l:herbs/terra_moss)terra moss$() in a radius based on the block it is facing, spawning the moss above the dispenser.$(br2)Most significantly, its ability to gather drops from entities can also be leveraged by a dispenser, although these drops are spawned at the entity.
This extends to shearing wool from sheep and other mundane uses.
